column1: You can read more about my thoughts & the work we've accomplished together in an op-ed I wrote via @ALDailyNews: https://t.co/P0GVv3gl2B

My name won't be on the ballot in 2020 but our work isn't finished. I'm committed to continuing the fight for AL & the people I represent until I cast my last vote on the floor of the People's House. Until Jan. 2021 I will continue the important work we started over 9 yrs ago.

On Friday I announced that I will not seek reelection to a 6th term in 2020. My family & I have been humbled by the outpouring of kind words & encouragement we have received over the last several days.
Thank you for your kind words & well wishes @SenShelby! It has been an honor to serve our state with you. https://t.co/cqIWLEeHkT

As we prepare to close this chapter I extend my sincerest thanks to my husband our children our parents families friends colleagues & staff who all made our important work possible & offered their support every step of the way. via @ALDailyNews: https://t.co/aKf6FVokQf

We have delivered some incredible results for our military veterans ag community & the unborn. We aren't finished yet. My name will not be on the ballot in 2020 but I remain committed to continuing the fight until I cast my last vote on the House floor.

Riley & I & our children Margaret & George will be forever grateful to the people of AL-02 for giving us the tremendous privilege & honor of serving our state & country. Throughout my 5 terms I have cast every vote w/ the guiding principle that Alabama always comes first.
Today & every day I am proud to be an American & thankful to call this great country home. Happy #IndependenceDay from my family to yours! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/43axm0YXGm

Today I was honored to receive the @USChamber Spirit of Enterprise award in recognition of my unwavering commitment to pro-business policy. I will always support commonsense growth-oriented legislation that will foster economic prosperity & help our business communities thrive. https://t.co/kFf4QhfiVr

This morning I was honored to receive the Family Research Council’s True Blue Award for scoring 100% on their 2018 vote scorecard. In Congress I will always support policies that strengthen American families and protect the unborn. #ProLife @FRCAction @FRCdc https://t.co/afGUEDcjdx

I believe our Founding Fathers knew what they were doing when they included the Second Amendment in our Constitution & I will continue to fight against Democrats’ efforts to weaken it. I’ve said it before & I’ll say it again: I value our #2A right & I will always protect it.

I just voted against H.R. 8 because as a gun owner I believe in the importance of our constitutional right to keep & bear arms. This lazy piece of legislation would not protect Americans from gun violence – it just creates more hoops for law-abiding citizens to jump through. https://t.co/B8K8OdKRki
